## PromptManager.register() method

Register commands. Don't forget to call `unregister` on plugin exit.

**Signature:**

```typescript
register(commands: {
    name?: string;
    label?: string;
    id?: string;
    when?: () => boolean;
    callback: ((prompt: Prompt) => Promise<void>) | ((prompt: Prompt) => void) | Command[];
  }[]): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

commands


</td><td>

{ name?: string; label?: string; id?: string; when?: () =&gt; boolean; callback: ((prompt: [Prompt](./zotero-plugin-toolkit.prompt.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt;) \| ((prompt: [Prompt](./zotero-plugin-toolkit.prompt.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void) \| [Command](./zotero-plugin-toolkit.command.md)<!-- -->\[\]; }\[\]


</td><td>

Command\[\]


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Example


```ts
let getReader = () => {
  return BasicTool.getZotero().Reader.getByTabID(
    (Zotero.getMainWindow().Zotero_Tabs).selectedID
  )
}

register([
  {
    name: "Split Horizontally",
    label: "Zotero",
    when: () => getReader() as boolean,
    callback: (prompt: Prompt) => getReader().menuCmd("splitHorizontally")
  },
  {
    name: "Split Vertically",
    label: "Zotero",
    when: () => getReader() as boolean,
    callback: (prompt: Prompt) => getReader().menuCmd("splitVertically")
  }
])
```
